FuncDef: The display disk partition command is used to view information about disk partition . The display disk partition command is used to view information about disk partition .

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a disk partition.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies an available slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: Run the display disk partition command to view disk partition related information.
